div.p: Value Set Definition DrawnFromCodeSystem 0.4.0.127.0.16.1.1.2.1 (EDQM) PropertyBasedContentSet.IncludeWithProperty.Expression ( ([Concept Status] = ‘Current’) AND ([Concept Class] IN (‘PDF’ ; ‘CMT’; ‘CDF’; ‘PFT') AND ([Domain] = 'Human and Veterinary') ) PDF = Pharmaceutical dose formCMT = Combined termsCDF = Combined pharmaceutical dose formPFT = Patient FriendlyThe list of value reported hereafter is provided only as exemplification
